Commpany_info.description: 3DPRINTUK is a leading 3D printing service, offering cost-effective alternatives to injection moulding for small, complex parts. We specialise in low- to medium-volume SLS, MJF, and SAF 3D printing, delivering precise, durable parts that bridge the gap between prototyping and injection moulding.nnAs a carbon-neutral, ISO 9001 and 14001:2015 certified company, we provide flexible solutions with short turnaround times, catering to businesses across the automotive, aerospace, industrial, and electronic sectors.nnKey Highlights:nnuD83DuDE80 Largest capacity SLS and MJF 3D printing service in the UK.nâ¡ Batch manufacturing specialists, offering substantial price breaks for higher-volume orders.nuD83DuDCBC Trade accounts available, unlocking exclusive trade pricing.nuD83DuDCE6 Scheduled and call-off orders, enabling you to plan ahead while securing low-cost options.nnWith over 10,000 companies worldwide trusting us as their manufacturing partner, we can produce anything from one-off rapid prototypes to production runs of tens of thousands of parts, on demand.nnuD83DuDCE9 Upload your CAD file now for an instant quote, or contact our customer support team at hello@3dprint-uk.co.uk for any enquiries.

Commpany_info.description: At 3D Printing Manchester we provide a full turnkey solution to take a concept through to a 3D design which can then be 3D printed to give you your first prototype. If you then need to mass produce, we can get then injection mould to bring the unit cost down. For technical one of product or legacy parts we can produce 3D printed items in various plastics metals and carbon fibre composites - stronger than steel and lighter than aluminium. Ideal for high tech industries. For legacy part stockists, why not talk to us about increasing your stock range whilst reduce stocks, releasing cash and moving to a digital parts catalogue?

Commpany_info.description: Mark 3D UK Limited specializes in the supply and support of the Markforged range of carbon fibre and metal 3D printing machines. nnOur business helps engineers produce (much) stronger, fully functional and better looking 3D printed parts. A combination of industry leading software, excellent machine build quality and a range of patented materials means the Markforged products are a reliable alternative to conventional methods and makes low volume manufacturing a truly viable alternative to conventional machining. nnSo if you'd like to build stronger, ship faster and spend less on manufacturing components you now have a viable alternative to consider.

Commpany_info.description: 3D Printing Express helps startups, product teams, and hardware designers avoid long lead times, high costs, and unreliable suppliers.nnWe provide fast functional prototyping and low-volume batch 3D printing using FDM. Perfect for teams who need real parts, quickly.nnNo large orders needed. No waiting weeks. Just consistent, high-quality prints delivered on time.nnWe solve:nnLong delays from overseas suppliersnnExpensive setup costs for small runsnnPoor print quality from cheap providersnnOur clients trust us for:nnFast prototyping and design testingnnSmall-batch production (10â500 parts)nnCustom enclosures, brackets, and working partsnnBased in the UK, we focus on speed, quality, and making your ideas realâfast.nnOur Specialties Include:n3D Printing Services, FDM 3D Printing, Rapid Prototyping, Low-Volume, Manufacturing, Batch Production, Product Development Support, Hardware Prototyping, Custom Enclosures, Functional Prototypes, Manufacturing, Design for Additive Manufacturing, Engineering Prototypes, Short-Run Production, Prototype Testing, Custom Part Fabrication, 3D Printed Components, Hardware Design Assistance, Product Iteration Services, UK-Based 3D Printing.

Commpany_info.description: Hobs 3D provides one of the most comprehensive ranges of high-quality 3D solutions in the world.nnWe combine cutting edge technology in 3D printing, VR, AR and CGI with traditional artistry and craftsmanship in modelmaking and 3D visualisation to support our clients in their design process, to help win bids and tenders and in public consultations. nnWe cater to multiple industries including architecture, property development, construction, engineering and fine art. Commpany_info.description: We specialise in rapid prototyping and the manufacture high quality 3D printers. Our machines are modular and can be tailored to each individual requirement. Our production techniques cover 3D printing, CNC machining, laser cutting, mould making and many more. Between our skilled set of in-house experts, we have extensive knowledge in engineering, product design and modelling. This allows us to provide a professional service to projects which require a physical product. Whether it's a proof of concept, or a batch production run, we can turn your imagination into reality. Our CAD and design team can also make edits and tweaks to aid function or manufacturing to streamline the entire process saving you time and money.
